data.text: Ngʼat mohero puonj mar rieko ohero ngʼeyo,
Ngʼat maber yudo pwoch kuom Jehova Nyasaye,
Ngʼato ok nyal gerore motegno kuom richo,
Dhako ma kite longʼo en osimbo mar chwore,
Chenro mar ngʼat makare nikare,
Weche mag joricho opondo karito chwero remo,
Joricho osewiti kendo gilal nono,
Ngʼato ipako kaluwore gi riekone,
Ber bedo dhano adhana, to in gi jatich,
Ngʼat makare chiwo kony ne gik ma jambe dwaro,
Ngʼat matiyo e puothe biro bedo gi chiemo mogundho,
Joricho dwaro gik moyaki mag jogo mamono,
Ngʼat marach imako mana gi wuoyone maricho,
Weche mabeyo mawuok e dho ngʼato miyo obedo gi gik mabeyo,
Yor ngʼat mofuwo nenorene ni nikare,
Ngʼat mofuwo nyiso mirimbe mapiyo,
Janeno ma ja-adiera chiwo neno mobidhore,
Weche mag muomruok chwoyo chuny mana kaka ligangla,
Dhok ma ja-adiera osiko manyaka chiengʼ,
Wuond ni e chuny jogo machano timo marach,
Onge gima rach manyalo biro ni ngʼat makare;
Jehova Nyasaye mon kod dhok mariambo,
Ngʼat mariek orito ngʼeyone e iye,
Tich matek miyo ngʼato bedo gi duongʼ,
Chuny maparore miyo ngʼato bedo mool,
Ngʼat makare dak gi osiepene e yo mowinjore,
Jasamuoyo ok nyal yudo dwarone,
Yo makare nitie gi ngima,
